channel.title: Massacred World PVP Release
channel.description:
Well this was my very successful Massacred World PVP. I've wanted to release this for a while but never got round to it. [b][i][u]Features[/u][/i][/b]
- FULLSCREEN login screen with deaths kills etc - Clue scrolls with rewards that have emotes (like flared trousers) - Full dart system with dragon darts - I added a tutorial system with floating text and next/previous buttons - I added a multi zone teleport with right click on the npc teleport - I added a highscoreboard - Both of those remember your choices - Fixed crossbow glitch - Made a custom EP system - With custom interface as well - At 100% you get artefacts - I edited all the shops so it was more suitable for pking - I added level changing in pvp zones - I added bones on altars - I fixed pretty much every single bug in the game - I added drag platebody - I added staff of light - I added arcane stream necklace (fully working) - Perfect combat - PvP tasks - Thats where you have to kill mains zerkers or pures as atask - EP system - Click levelling - Thats where you click stats, enter amount and done - I made it so when you buy firecape it costs 0 from the shop afterwards, incase people lose by dc - I added barrelchest boss, kbd and chaos ele - I added it as a pvp world - I added a pvp artifact system - I added a pvp drops system - I added a pkp system with point bonuses for pvp task kills - I fixed the altars - I added mime random events that give gear - Loads more just ask on MSN
[b][i][u]Update Log[/u][/i][/b]
31 Oct 2010: Tripled scroll droprates 31 Oct 2010: Fixed random event glitch 30 Oct 2010: Added full zam/sara/guth/gilded to scrolls 29 Oct 2010: Added emotes to sleeping cap, pantaloons 29 Oct 2010: Added emotes to flared trousers, powdered wig 29 Oct 2010: Added full clue scroll system (handwrote!) 28 Oct 2010: Fixed up some moderator commands 27 Oct 2010: Made all text glow yellow at 100% EP 27 Oct 2010: Fixed a chaos elemental tele bug 27 Oct 2010: Added prayer deduction by barrelchest 27 Oct 2010: Edited barrelchest alot 26 Oct 2010: Added a massively improved tutorial system 26 Oct 2010: Added barrelchest boss tele for donators 26 Oct 2010: Removed all glory teleports 26 Oct 2010: Changed edge tele to varrock tele 25 Oct 2010: Added full EP system 25 Oct 2010: Fixed the mute commands 24 Oct 2010: Removed unnecessary code from the process 24 Oct 2010: Improved bandos boots stats 24 Oct 2010: Corrected login screen information 23 Oct 2010: Added random event with rewards 23 Oct 2010: Added fullscreen login screen 22 Oct 2010: Removed unnecessary sendMessages 22 Oct 2010: Added rules interface when you make a new acc 22 Oct 2010: Added all hilt drops etc to KBD/Chaos ele 21 Oct 2010: Added godsword block emotes 21 Oct 2010: Added anchor with correct models gfx etc 21 Oct 2010: Added all darts into stores 20 Oct 2010: Fixed crystal bow glitch 20 Oct 2010: Added new items in pkp store 19 Oct 2010: Fixed black dhide item requirements 19 Oct 2010: Gave option for people to add starter to bank 19 Oct 2010: Made vengeance save to character file 18 Oct 2010: Added halloween event 17 Oct 2010: Added highscoreboard 17 Oct 2010: Added multi zone at edge 16 Oct 2010: Fixed void helms hair glitch 16 Oct 2010: Fixed prayer icon glitching 16 Oct 2010: Created development thread
[img]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/6701/36189570.png[/img] [img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/4145/81339279.png[/img] [img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/6853/56006619.png[/img] [img]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/9826/79784799.png[/img] [img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/8748/36690988.png[/img] [img]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/5914/91340715.png[/img] [img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/2911/74569661.png[/img] [img]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/8758/20491086.png[/img] [img]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/4404/23738931.png[/img] [img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/1114/28964976.png[/img] [img]http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/293/99923371.png[/img] [img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/4271/96974884.png[/img] [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/8025/76493347.png[/img] [i]EP System: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZH4HuSgtGE]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZH4HuSgtGE[/url] (It goes slower then this, I increased it for the example) I hope people enjoy this source, it's pretty much PI but based entirely on PK'ing and a pvp world. There is a distinct artifact system. I'm pretty sure every one of you can rip some of my shit from this source. No claws. No ancient curses. 474 lookalike. There may be some errors in the cmd Flame away, haters.[/i] DOWNLOAD PACKAGE! Link;[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?tmssnbay7tfl4ag]http://www.mediafire.com/?tmssnbay7tfl4ag[/url]

item.title: Massacred World PVP Release
item.dc:creator: @Sokolkiing Sokolkiing
item.description:
@Sokolkiing wrote:

Well this was my very successful Massacred World PVP.
I’ve wanted to release this for a while but never got round to it.
Features

- FULLSCREEN login screen with deaths kills etc - Clue scrolls with rewards that have emotes (like flared trousers) - Full dart system with dragon darts - I added a tutorial system with floating text and next/previous buttons - I added a multi zone teleport with right click on the npc teleport - I added a highscoreboard - Both of those remember your choices - Fixed crossbow glitch - Made a custom EP system - With custom interface as well - At 100% you get artefacts - I edited all the shops so it was more suitable for pking - I added level changing in pvp zones - I added bones on altars - I fixed pretty much every single bug in the game - I added drag platebody - I added staff of light - I added arcane stream necklace (fully working) - Perfect combat - PvP tasks - Thats where you have to kill mains zerkers or pures as atask - EP system - Click levelling - Thats where you click stats, enter amount and done - I made it so when you buy firecape it costs 0 from the shop afterwards, incase people lose by dc - I added barrelchest boss, kbd and chaos ele - I added it as a pvp world - I added a pvp artifact system - I added a pvp drops system - I added a pkp system with point bonuses for pvp task kills - I fixed the altars - I added mime random events that give gear - Loads more just ask on MSN
[b][i][u]Update Log[/u][/i][/b]
31 Oct 2010: Tripled scroll droprates 31 Oct 2010: Fixed random event glitch 30 Oct 2010: Added full zam/sara/guth/gilded to scrolls 29 Oct 2010: Added emotes to sleeping cap, pantaloons 29 Oct 2010: Added emotes to flared trousers, powdered wig 29 Oct 2010: Added full clue scroll system (handwrote!) 28 Oct 2010: Fixed up some moderator commands 27 Oct 2010: Made all text glow yellow at 100% EP 27 Oct 2010: Fixed a chaos elemental tele bug 27 Oct 2010: Added prayer deduction by barrelchest 27 Oct 2010: Edited barrelchest alot 26 Oct 2010: Added a massively improved tutorial system 26 Oct 2010: Added barrelchest boss tele for donators 26 Oct 2010: Removed all glory teleports 26 Oct 2010: Changed edge tele to varrock tele 25 Oct 2010: Added full EP system 25 Oct 2010: Fixed the mute commands 24 Oct 2010: Removed unnecessary code from the process 24 Oct 2010: Improved bandos boots stats 24 Oct 2010: Corrected login screen information 23 Oct 2010: Added random event with rewards 23 Oct 2010: Added fullscreen login screen 22 Oct 2010: Removed unnecessary sendMessages 22 Oct 2010: Added rules interface when you make a new acc 22 Oct 2010: Added all hilt drops etc to KBD/Chaos ele 21 Oct 2010: Added godsword block emotes 21 Oct 2010: Added anchor with correct models gfx etc 21 Oct 2010: Added all darts into stores 20 Oct 2010: Fixed crystal bow glitch 20 Oct 2010: Added new items in pkp store 19 Oct 2010: Fixed black dhide item requirements 19 Oct 2010: Gave option for people to add starter to bank 19 Oct 2010: Made vengeance save to character file 18 Oct 2010: Added halloween event 17 Oct 2010: Added highscoreboard 17 Oct 2010: Added multi zone at edge 16 Oct 2010: Fixed void helms hair glitch 16 Oct 2010: Fixed prayer icon glitching 16 Oct 2010: Created development thread
[img]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/6701/36189570.png[/img]













[i]EP System: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZH4HuSgtGE
(It goes slower then this, I increased it for the example)

I hope people enjoy this source, it’s pretty much PI but based entirely on PK’ing and a pvp world. There is a distinct artifact system. I’m pretty sure every one of you can rip some of my shit from this source.

No claws.
No ancient curses.
474 lookalike.

There may be some errors in the cmd

Flame away, haters.[/i]

DOWNLOAD PACKAGE!

Link;http://www.mediafire.com/?tmssnbay7tfl4ag
